text: @SpeakerPelosi @Morning_Joe @SpeakerPelosi was not properly prepared for a objective conversation about the global spread of COVID-19 from China. The president had rational steps to slow or stop the spread of the 🦠 into the US, but Pelosi and Democrats in congress refused to support him and the US.
